Token.Abstract: The AlfrescoDocumentFolderService manages folders and documents of an Alfresco repository. The service provides methods to retrieve documents and folders, but also provides methods to create and update documents and folders.
Initialises with a standard Cloud or OnPremise session

Parameter.Name: session
Parameter.Abstract: the AlfrescoSession to initialise the site service with.

Token.Abstract: Creates a new folder using the given properties in the given folder.

Parameter.Name: folderName
Parameter.Abstract: The name of the folder to be created.

Parameter.Name: folder
Parameter.Abstract: The parent folder of the new folder.

Parameter.Name: properties
Parameter.Abstract: Additional properties that are used to create the folder.

Parameter.Name: completionBlock
Parameter.Abstract: The block that's called with the created folder in case the operation succeeds.

Token.Abstract: Creates a new document using the contents of a local file. The new document is created within the given folder.

Parameter.Name: documentName
Parameter.Abstract: The name of the document to be created in the repository

Parameter.Name: folder
Parameter.Abstract: The parent folder to create the document in.

Parameter.Name: file
Parameter.Abstract: The local file to be uploaded.

Parameter.Name: properties
Parameter.Abstract: Additional properties that are used to create the document.

Parameter.Name: completionBlock
Parameter.Abstract: The block that's called with the created document in case the operation succeeds.

Parameter.Name: progressBlock
Parameter.Abstract: The block that's called with the upload progress.

Token.Abstract: Called when the call completes

Parameter.Name: completionBlock
Parameter.Abstract: Called when the call completes

Token.Abstract: the node for which permissions are being queried

Parameter.Name: node
Parameter.Abstract: the node for which permissions are being queried

Parameter.Name: completionBlock
Parameter.Abstract: the block returns an AlfrescoPermissions and NSError object)

Token.Abstract: Retrieves all the children of the given folder.

Parameter.Name: folder
Parameter.Abstract: The folder for which the children are retrieved.

Parameter.Name: completionBlock
Parameter.Abstract: The block that's called with the retrieved children in case the operation succeeds.

Token.Abstract: Retrieves all the children of the given folder with a listing context.

Parameter.Name: folder
Parameter.Abstract: The folder for which the children are retrieved.

Parameter.Name: listingContext
Parameter.Abstract: The listing context with a paging definition that's used to retrieve the children.

Parameter.Name: completionBlock
Parameter.Abstract: The block that's called with the retrieved children in case the operation succeeds.

Token.Abstract: Retrieves all the documents in the given folder.

Parameter.Name: folder
Parameter.Abstract: The folder for which the documents are retrieved.

Parameter.Name: completionBlock
Parameter.Abstract: The block that's called with the retrieved documents in case the operation succeeds.

Token.Abstract: Retrieves all the documents in the given folder with a listing context.

Parameter.Name: folder
Parameter.Abstract: The folder for which the documents are retrieved.

Parameter.Name: listingContext
Parameter.Abstract: The listing context with a paging definition that's used to retrieve the documents.

Parameter.Name: completionBlock
Parameter.Abstract: The block that's called with the retrieved documents in case the operation succeeds.

Token.Abstract: Retrieves all the sub folders in the given folder.

Parameter.Name: folder
Parameter.Abstract: The folder for which the sub folders are retrieved.

Parameter.Name: completionBlock
Parameter.Abstract: The block that's called with the retrieved sub folders in case the operation succeeds.

Token.Abstract: Retrieves all the sub folders in the given folder with a listing context

Parameter.Name: folder
Parameter.Abstract: The folder for which the sub folders are retrieved.

Parameter.Name: listingContext
Parameter.Abstract: The listing context with a paging definition that's used to retrieve the sub folders.

Parameter.Name: completionBlock
Parameter.Abstract: The block that's called with the retrieved sub folders in case the operation succeeds.

Token.Abstract: Retrieves a document or folder with the given node identifier.

Parameter.Name: identifier
Parameter.Abstract: The node identifier that's used to query for a specific node.

Parameter.Name: completionBlock
Parameter.Abstract: The block that's called with the retrieved node in case the operation succeeds.

Token.Abstract: Retrieves a node from the repository with the given folder path.

Parameter.Name: path
Parameter.Abstract: The folder path that's used to query for a specific node.

Parameter.Name: completionBlock
Parameter.Abstract: The block that's called with the retrieved node in case the operation succeeds.

Token.Abstract: Retrieves a node from the repository with the given folder path relative to the given folder.

Parameter.Name: path
Parameter.Abstract: The folder path that's used to query for a specific node.

Parameter.Name: folder
Parameter.Abstract: The root folder that's used to query for a specific node.

Parameter.Name: completionBlock
Parameter.Abstract: The block that's called with the retrieved node in case the operation succeeds.

Token.Abstract: Retrieves the parent folder of the given node.

Parameter.Name: node
Parameter.Abstract: The node for which the parent folder is retrieved.

Parameter.Name: completionBlock
Parameter.Abstract: The block that's called with the retrieved parent folder in case the operation succeeds.

Token.Abstract: Retrieves the thumbnail rendition file for the given node.

Parameter.Name: node
Parameter.Abstract: the AlfrescoNode for which a thumbnail rendition image is to be retrieved.

Parameter.Name: renditionName
Parameter.Abstract: The type of thumbnail to be retrieved. For example 'doclib' can be used (defined as AlfrescoThumbnailRendition )

Parameter.Name: completionBlock
Parameter.Abstract: The block that's called with the local AlfrescoContentFile containing the thumbnail URL/data.

Token.Abstract: Downloads the content of the given document and stores it in the given file. The delegate object will be informed when the content is downloaded.

Parameter.Name: document
Parameter.Abstract: The document that needs to be downloaded.

Parameter.Name: completionBlock
Parameter.Abstract: The block containing an AlfrescoContentFile and NSError object. error will be nil if successful. Otherwise, AlfrescoContentFile will be nil.

Parameter.Name: progressBlock
Parameter.Abstract: The block that's called with the download progress.

Token.Abstract: Updates a document with the contents of a local file.

Parameter.Name: document
Parameter.Abstract: The document that needs to be updated.

Parameter.Name: completionBlock
Parameter.Abstract: The block that's called with the updated document in case the operation succeeds.

Parameter.Name: progressBlock
Parameter.Abstract: The block that's called with the upload progress.

Parameter.Name: contentFile
Parameter.Abstract: The Alfresco Content File to be updated.

Token.Abstract: Updates the properties of a specific node.

Parameter.Name: node
Parameter.Abstract: The node that needs to be updated.

Parameter.Name: properties
Parameter.Abstract: The properties that need to be updated for the given node.

Parameter.Name: completionBlock
Parameter.Abstract: The block that's called with the updated node in case the operation succeeds.

Token.Abstract: Deletes an individual node from the Alfresco repository.

Parameter.Name: node
Parameter.Abstract: The node that needs to be deleted.

Parameter.Name: completionBlock
Parameter.Abstract: The block that's called in case the operation succeeds.
